value:
I cannot believe this. Me, spending
my time with the mortals of Askr...

Loki and I made a wager. The winner
could make the loser do anything...
I could not help but take the risk.

The Thórr you know is your enemy...
Yet you bring me here as your ally?
Help me to understand...

You should not exist. Nor should your
power to summon. You are outside
Alfaðör's design. You should not be.

If you have a request to make of me,
out with it. My strength is yours to
direct now.

I am Thórr. I will not be entertaining
questions pertaining to how I came
to serve $Nf.

What incredible new strength... Is this
the work of $Nu?

Every strike is a chance to
grow stronger.
Hmph. Bring me a challenge!

Thank you. A summoner's power is
even greater than I had imagined...

I am Thórr. I made an arrangement
with Loki, and now my strength is
yours to wield...for now.

Did you summon me on purpose,
$Nu?$k$pI only try to understand. You and
that weapon you carry are not part
of this world as it was designed.$k$pAnd we cannot abide a mortal with
power enough to challenge the gods.
What you fight for is incidental.$k$pAlfaðör is likely to command that I rid
this world of you and your power.$k$pAnd when that happens, I...
Well...
はぁっ！
いくぞ
うっ！
なんという…
Great Mjölnir!
Stay resolute. I'm ready.
A warrior is owed respect.
Show me your strength.
Magnificent...
Hmpht
My name is Thórr. True strength is what I seek.
Why would you touch me like that?
In battle, you must always show your foe respect.
Loki and I have known each other for a long time. In truth, I do not always understand her motives.
A mortal, powerless, takes up a blade and faces down death... That, too, is strength.
There is no breaking the bond our contract forged. I will fight for you—no matter what.
Know that I am prepared to give all that I am to you, should you ask.
By your will.
I seek a foe.
They will submit.
